text: Application Security Strategist defined secure SDLC policy with 7-day SLA for critical vulnerabilities
Threat Modeling Specialist performed STRIDE analysis identifying spoofing and tampering threats
SAST Tool scanned 90 repositories finding 14 critical and 36 high severity vulnerabilities
SCA Dependency Scanner detected 22 critical vulnerabilities in 4800 dependencies
OSS License Scanner identified GPL-3.0 and AGPL-3.0 license violations in CRM and ERP applications
SBOM Generator created software bill of materials for 12 vendor integrations
Secrets Detection Tool found 48 hardcoded secrets in repositories requiring immediate revocation
IaC Scanner identified 9 critical misconfigurations in 260 Terraform and Kubernetes files
Container Scanner detected 12 critical vulnerabilities in 210 container images requiring patching
CI/CD Security Plugin blocked 11 builds with critical vulnerabilities preventing production deployment
WAF Tool blocked 2500 OWASP Top 10 attacks with 1.3% false positive rate
RASP Tool detected 60 attacks in 20 monitored applications blocking 56 and missing 4
API Security Gateway secured 135 APIs detecting 16 violations and blocking 14
API Discovery Tool mapped 18 shadow APIs requiring security controls
Fuzzing Tool discovered 8 crashes and 4 unique bugs in 25 tested applications
Chaos Engineering Tool ran 12 experiments with 10 successes identifying database timeout failures
ML Adversarial Testing Tool found 3 vulnerabilities in 4 AI models requiring mitigation
Bug Bounty Platform received 42 reports with 28 valid findings and 20 patched
Threat Intelligence integration mapped 32 CVEs to ERP and payment applications at risk
IDE Security Plugin provided real-time feedback to 120 developers with 340 findings
Mean time to remediate critical vulnerabilities improved to 6 days meeting SLA
Application Security audit score reached 96% with 89% SLA compliance and 95% coverage
Checkmarx SAST scanner identified SQL injection vulnerability in payment processing code
Burp Suite Enterprise DAST detected cross-site scripting in login endpoint
Snyk Open Source scanner found Log4j vulnerability CVE-2021-44228 in dependencies
Dependabot automated dependency updates patched 45 vulnerable packages
Contrast Security IAST detected runtime vulnerability in authentication flow
Threat Dragon tool generated threat model for billing service identifying authentication bypass
IriusRisk threat modeling platform mapped threats to MITRE ATT&CK framework
Trivy container scanner identified 15 high severity vulnerabilities in Docker images
Clair vulnerability scanner detected 8 critical issues in container registry
Open Policy Agent enforced policy-as-code blocking insecure container deployments
tfsec Infrastructure as Code scanner found 12 misconfigurations in Terraform templates
checkov IaC security scanner detected insecure S3 bucket configuration in CloudFormation
SonarLint IDE plugin flagged 23 code smells and security hotspots during development
Application Security posture management platform tracked 150 applications with 85% secure
Secure SDLC adoption reached 92% with security gates in all CI/CD pipelines
Vulnerability backlog reduced to 45 critical and 120 high severity issues
SBOM compliance achieved 94% with mandatory generation for all applications
Bug bounty closure rate improved to 71% with average resolution time of 12 days
Runtime attacks blocked increased to 2550 with WAF and RASP protection enabled
Application Security coverage reached 95% across all production and development environments
OWASP Top 10 coverage achieved 100% with all vulnerability categories addressed
Secure coding training completion reached 88% for all software developers
Application Security false positive rate reduced to 2.5% improving scan accuracy
